div.p: We create ceremonies that look like you. Couples and families follow one another but each story is unique and deserves to be highlighted in a way that suits you.
Our first passion. They are for us the basis of any decoration. In a natural, wild and poetic style, we will be delighted to flower your event.
We will be able to help you to choose everything around the flowers and think everything through with you in the smallest details (candles, table plan, photo corner, reception panels, ...).
